62 "customObjectFormatterEnabled";

69using protocol::Runtime::RemoteObject;

71namespace {
72
73template <typename ProtocolCallback>
74class EvaluateCallbackWrapper : public EvaluateCallback {
75 public:
76 static std::shared_ptr<EvaluateCallback> wrap(
77 std::unique_ptr<ProtocolCallback> callback) {
78 return std::shared_ptr<EvaluateCallback>(
79 new EvaluateCallbackWrapper(std::move(callback)));
80 }
81 void sendSuccess(std::unique_ptr<protocol::Runtime::RemoteObject> result,
82 protocol::Maybe<protocol::Runtime::ExceptionDetails>
83 exceptionDetails) override {
84 return m_callback->sendSuccess(std::move(result),
85 std::move(exceptionDetails));
86 }
87 void sendFailure(const protocol::DispatchResponse& response) override {
88 return m_callback->sendFailure(response);
89 }
90
91 private:
92 explicit EvaluateCallbackWrapper(std::unique_ptr<ProtocolCallback> callback)
93 : m_callback(std::move(callback)) {}
94
95 std::unique_ptr<ProtocolCallback> m_callback;
96};
97
98template <typename ProtocolCallback>
99bool wrapEvaluateResultAsync(InjectedScript* injectedScript,
100 v8::MaybeLocal<v8::Value> maybeResultValue,
101 const v8::TryCatch& tryCatch,
102 const String16& objectGroup,
103 const WrapOptions& wrapOptions,
104 bool throwOnSideEffect,
105 ProtocolCallback* callback) {
106 std::unique_ptr<RemoteObject> result;
107 Maybe<protocol::Runtime::ExceptionDetails> exceptionDetails;
108
109 Response response = injectedScript->wrapEvaluateResult(
110 maybeResultValue, tryCatch, objectGroup, wrapOptions, throwOnSideEffect,
111 &result, &exceptionDetails);
112 if (response.IsSuccess()) {
113 callback->sendSuccess(std::move(result), std::move(exceptionDetails));
114 return true;
115 }
116 callback->sendFailure(response);
117 return false;
118}
119
120void innerCallFunctionOn(
121 V8InspectorSessionImpl* session, InjectedScript::Scope& scope,
122 v8::Local<v8::Value> recv, const String16& expression,
123 Maybe<protocol::Array<protocol::Runtime::CallArgument>> optionalArguments,
124 bool silent, std::unique_ptr<WrapOptions> wrapOptions, bool userGesture,
125 bool awaitPromise, const String16& objectGroup, bool throwOnSideEffect,
126 std::unique_ptr<V8RuntimeAgentImpl::CallFunctionOnCallback> callback) {
127 V8InspectorImpl* inspector = session->inspector();
128
129 std::unique_ptr<v8::Global<v8::Value>[]> argv = nullptr;
130 int argc = 0;
131 if (optionalArguments.has_value()) {
132 protocol::Array<protocol::Runtime::CallArgument>& arguments =
133 optionalArguments.value();
134 argc = static_cast<int>(arguments.size());
135 argv.reset(new v8::Global<v8::Value>[argc]);
136 for (int i = 0; i < argc; ++i) {
137 v8::Local<v8::Value> argumentValue;
138 Response response = scope.injectedScript()->resolveCallArgument(
139 arguments[i].get(), &argumentValue);
140 if (!response.IsSuccess()) {
141 callback->sendFailure(response);
142 return;
143 }
144 argv[i] = v8::Global<v8::Value>(inspector->isolate(), argumentValue);
145 }
146 }
147
148 if (silent) scope.ignoreExceptionsAndMuteConsole();
149 if (userGesture) scope.pretendUserGesture();
150
151 // Temporarily enable allow evals for inspector.
152 scope.allowCodeGenerationFromStrings();
153
154 v8::MaybeLocal<v8::Value> maybeFunctionValue;
155 v8::Local<v8::Script> functionScript;
156 if (inspector
157 ->compileScript(scope.context(), "(" + expression + ")", String16())
158 .ToLocal(&functionScript)) {
159 v8::MicrotasksScope microtasksScope(scope.context(),
160 v8::MicrotasksScope::kRunMicrotasks);
161 maybeFunctionValue = functionScript->Run(scope.context());
162 }
163 // Re-initialize after running client's code, as it could have destroyed
164 // context or session.
165 Response response = scope.initialize();
166 if (!response.IsSuccess()) {
167 callback->sendFailure(response);
168 return;
169 }
170
171 if (scope.tryCatch().HasCaught()) {
172 wrapEvaluateResultAsync(scope.injectedScript(), maybeFunctionValue,
173 scope.tryCatch(), objectGroup,
174 WrapOptions({WrapMode::kIdOnly}), throwOnSideEffect,
175 callback.get());
176 return;
177 }
178
179 v8::Local<v8::Value> functionValue;
180 if (!maybeFunctionValue.ToLocal(&functionValue) ||
181 !functionValue->IsFunction()) {
182 callback->sendFailure(Response::ServerError(
183 "Given expression does not evaluate to a function"));
184 return;
185 }
186
187 v8::MaybeLocal<v8::Value> maybeResultValue;
188 {
189 v8::MicrotasksScope microtasksScope(scope.context(),
190 v8::MicrotasksScope::kRunMicrotasks);
191 maybeResultValue = v8::debug::CallFunctionOn(
192 scope.context(), functionValue.As<v8::Function>(), recv, argc,
193 argv.get(), throwOnSideEffect);
194 }
195 // Re-initialize after running client's code, as it could have destroyed
196 // context or session.
197 response = scope.initialize();
198 if (!response.IsSuccess()) {
199 callback->sendFailure(response);
200 return;
201 }
202
203 if (!awaitPromise || scope.tryCatch().HasCaught()) {
204 wrapEvaluateResultAsync(scope.injectedScript(), maybeResultValue,
205 scope.tryCatch(), objectGroup, *wrapOptions,
206 throwOnSideEffect, callback.get());
207 return;
208 }
209
210 scope.injectedScript()->addPromiseCallback(
211 session, maybeResultValue, objectGroup, std::move(wrapOptions),
212 false /* replMode */, throwOnSideEffect,
213 EvaluateCallbackWrapper<V8RuntimeAgentImpl::CallFunctionOnCallback>::wrap(
214 std::move(callback)));
215}
216
217Response ensureContext(V8InspectorImpl* inspector, int contextGroupId,
218 Maybe<int> executionContextId,
219 Maybe<String16> uniqueContextId, int* contextId) {
220 if (executionContextId.has_value()) {
221 if (uniqueContextId.has_value()) {
222 return Response::InvalidParams(
223 "contextId and uniqueContextId are mutually exclusive");
224 }
225 *contextId = executionContextId.value();
226 } else if (uniqueContextId.has_value()) {
227 internal::V8DebuggerId uniqueId(uniqueContextId.value());
228 if (!uniqueId.isValid())
229 return Response::InvalidParams("invalid uniqueContextId");
230 int id = inspector->resolveUniqueContextId(uniqueId);
231 if (!id) return Response::InvalidParams("uniqueContextId not found");
232 *contextId = id;
233 } else {
234 v8::HandleScope handles(inspector->isolate());
235 v8::Local<v8::Context> defaultContext =
236 inspector->client()->ensureDefaultContextInGroup(contextGroupId);
237 if (defaultContext.IsEmpty())
238 return Response::ServerError("Cannot find default execution context");
239 *contextId = InspectedContext::contextId(defaultContext);
240 }
241
242 return Response::Success();
243}
244
245Response parseAdditionalSerializationParameters(
246 protocol::DictionaryValue* additionalParameters, v8::Isolate* isolate,
247 v8::Local<v8::Object>* result) {
248 v8::LocalVector<v8::Name> keys(isolate);
249 v8::LocalVector<v8::Value> values(isolate);
250
251 if (additionalParameters != nullptr) {
252 for (size_t i = 0; i < additionalParameters->size(); ++i) {
253 String16 key = (*additionalParameters).at(i).first;
254 keys.push_back(toV8String(isolate, key));
255
256 protocol::Value* value = (*additionalParameters).at(i).second;
257 String16 stringValue;
258 if (value->asString(&stringValue)) {
259 values.push_back(toV8String(isolate, stringValue));
260 continue;
261 }
262 int intValue;
263 if (value->asInteger(&intValue)) {
264 values.push_back(v8::Int32::New(isolate, intValue));
265 continue;
266 }
267 return Response::InvalidParams(
268 "Values of serializationOptions.additionalParameters can be only of "
269 "type string or integer.");
270 }
271 }
272 CHECK(keys.size() == values.size());
273 *result = v8::Object::New(isolate, v8::Null(isolate), keys.data(),
274 values.data(), keys.size());
275
276 return Response::Success();
277}
278
279Response getWrapOptions(
280 Maybe<bool> returnByValue, Maybe<bool> generatePreview,
281 Maybe<protocol::Runtime::SerializationOptions> maybeSerializationOptions,
282 v8::Isolate* isolate, std::unique_ptr<WrapOptions>* result) {
283 if (maybeSerializationOptions.has_value()) {
284 auto& serializationOptions = maybeSerializationOptions.value();
285 String16 serializationModeStr = serializationOptions.getSerialization();
286 if (serializationModeStr ==
287 protocol::Runtime::SerializationOptions::SerializationEnum::Deep) {
288 v8::Local<v8::Object> additionalParameters;
289 Response response = parseAdditionalSerializationParameters(
290 serializationOptions.getAdditionalParameters(nullptr), isolate,
291 &additionalParameters);
292 if (!response.IsSuccess()) {
293 return response;
294 }
295 *result = std::make_unique<WrapOptions>(
296 WrapOptions{WrapMode::kDeep,
297 {serializationOptions.getMaxDepth(v8::internal::kMaxInt),
298 v8::Global<v8::Object>(isolate, additionalParameters)}});
299 return Response::Success();
300 }
301 if (serializationModeStr ==
302 protocol::Runtime::SerializationOptions::SerializationEnum::Json) {
303 *result = std::make_unique<WrapOptions>(WrapOptions{WrapMode::kJson});
304 return Response::Success();
305 }
306 if (serializationModeStr ==
307 protocol::Runtime::SerializationOptions::SerializationEnum::IdOnly) {
308 *result = std::make_unique<WrapOptions>(WrapOptions{WrapMode::kIdOnly});
309 return Response::Success();
310 }
311 return Response::InvalidParams(
312 "Unknown serializationOptions.serialization value " +
313 serializationModeStr.utf8());
314 }
315
316 if (returnByValue.value_or(false)) {
317 *result = std::make_unique<WrapOptions>(WrapOptions{WrapMode::kJson});
318 return Response::Success();
319 }
320 if (generatePreview.value_or(false)) {
321 *result = std::make_unique<WrapOptions>(WrapOptions{WrapMode::kPreview});
322 return Response::Success();
323 }
324 *result = std::make_unique<WrapOptions>(WrapOptions{WrapMode::kIdOnly});
325 return Response::Success();
326}
327
328Response getWrapOptions(Maybe<bool> returnByValue, Maybe<bool> generatePreview,
329 v8::Isolate* isolate,
330 std::unique_ptr<WrapOptions>* result) {
331 return getWrapOptions(
332 std::move(returnByValue), std::move(generatePreview),
333 Maybe<protocol::Runtime::
334 SerializationOptions>() /* empty serialization options */,
335 isolate, result);
336}
337
338} // namespace
339
340V8RuntimeAgentImpl::V8RuntimeAgentImpl(
341 V8InspectorSessionImpl* session, protocol::FrontendChannel* FrontendChannel,
342 protocol::DictionaryValue* state,
343 std::shared_ptr<V8DebuggerBarrier> debuggerBarrier)
344 : m_session(session),
345 m_state(state),
346 m_frontend(FrontendChannel),
347 m_inspector(session->inspector()),
348 m_debuggerBarrier(debuggerBarrier),
349 m_enabled(false) {}
350
351V8RuntimeAgentImpl::~V8RuntimeAgentImpl() = default;
352
353void V8RuntimeAgentImpl::evaluate(
354 const String16& expression, Maybe<String16> objectGroup,
355 Maybe<bool> includeCommandLineAPI, Maybe<bool> silent,
356 Maybe<int> executionContextId, Maybe<bool> returnByValue,
357 Maybe<bool> generatePreview, Maybe<bool> userGesture,
358 Maybe<bool> maybeAwaitPromise, Maybe<bool> throwOnSideEffect,
359 Maybe<double> timeout, Maybe<bool> disableBreaks, Maybe<bool> maybeReplMode,
360 Maybe<bool> allowUnsafeEvalBlockedByCSP, Maybe<String16> uniqueContextId,
361 Maybe<protocol::Runtime::SerializationOptions> serializationOptions,
362 std::unique_ptr<EvaluateCallback> callback) {
363 TRACE_EVENT0(TRACE_DISABLED_BY_DEFAULT("devtools.timeline"),
364 "EvaluateScript");
365 int contextId = 0;
366 Response response = ensureContext(m_inspector, m_session->contextGroupId(),
367 std::move(executionContextId),
368 std::move(uniqueContextId), &contextId);
369 if (!response.IsSuccess()) {
370 callback->sendFailure(response);
371 return;
372 }
373
374 InjectedScript::ContextScope scope(m_session, contextId);
375 response = scope.initialize();
376 if (!response.IsSuccess()) {
377 callback->sendFailure(response);
378 return;
379 }
380
381 if (silent.value_or(false)) scope.ignoreExceptionsAndMuteConsole();
382 if (userGesture.value_or(false)) scope.pretendUserGesture();
383
384 if (includeCommandLineAPI.value_or(false)) scope.installCommandLineAPI();
385
386 const bool replMode = maybeReplMode.value_or(false);
387
388 if (allowUnsafeEvalBlockedByCSP.value_or(true)) {
389 // Temporarily enable allow evals for inspector.
390 scope.allowCodeGenerationFromStrings();
391 }
392 v8::MaybeLocal<v8::Value> maybeResultValue;
393 {
394 V8InspectorImpl::EvaluateScope evaluateScope(scope);
395 if (timeout.has_value()) {
396 response = evaluateScope.setTimeout(timeout.value() / 1000.0);
397 if (!response.IsSuccess()) {
398 callback->sendFailure(response);
399 return;
400 }
401 }
402 v8::MicrotasksScope microtasksScope(scope.context(),
403 v8::MicrotasksScope::kRunMicrotasks);
404 v8::debug::EvaluateGlobalMode mode =
405 v8::debug::EvaluateGlobalMode::kDefault;
406 if (throwOnSideEffect.value_or(false)) {
407 mode = v8::debug::EvaluateGlobalMode::kDisableBreaksAndThrowOnSideEffect;
408 } else if (disableBreaks.value_or(false)) {
409 mode = v8::debug::EvaluateGlobalMode::kDisableBreaks;
410 }
411 const v8::Local<v8::String> source =
412 toV8String(m_inspector->isolate(), expression);
413 maybeResultValue = v8::debug::EvaluateGlobal(m_inspector->isolate(), source,
414 mode, replMode);
415 } // Run microtasks before returning result.
416
417 // Re-initialize after running client's code, as it could have destroyed
418 // context or session.
419 response = scope.initialize();
420 if (!response.IsSuccess()) {
421 callback->sendFailure(response);
422 return;
423 }
424
425 std::unique_ptr<WrapOptions> wrapOptions;
426 response = getWrapOptions(
427 std::move(returnByValue), std::move(generatePreview),
428 std::move(serializationOptions), m_inspector->isolate(), &wrapOptions);
429 if (!response.IsSuccess()) {
430 callback->sendFailure(response);
431 return;
432 }
433
434 // REPL mode always returns a promise that must be awaited.
435 const bool await = replMode || maybeAwaitPromise.value_or(false);
436 if (!await || scope.tryCatch().HasCaught()) {
437 wrapEvaluateResultAsync(scope.injectedScript(), maybeResultValue,
438 scope.tryCatch(), objectGroup.value_or(""),
439 *wrapOptions, throwOnSideEffect.value_or(false),
440 callback.get());
441 return;
442 }
443 scope.injectedScript()->addPromiseCallback(
444 m_session, maybeResultValue, objectGroup.value_or(""),
445 std::move(wrapOptions), replMode, throwOnSideEffect.value_or(false),
446 EvaluateCallbackWrapper<EvaluateCallback>::wrap(std::move(callback)));
447}
448
449void V8RuntimeAgentImpl::awaitPromise(
450 const String16& promiseObjectId, Maybe<bool> returnByValue,
451 Maybe<bool> generatePreview,
452 std::unique_ptr<AwaitPromiseCallback> callback) {
453 InjectedScript::ObjectScope scope(m_session, promiseObjectId);
454 Response response = scope.initialize();
455 if (!response.IsSuccess()) {
456 callback->sendFailure(response);
457 return;
458 }
459 if (!scope.object()->IsPromise()) {
460 callback->sendFailure(
461 Response::ServerError("Could not find promise with given id"));
462 return;
463 }
464
465 std::unique_ptr<WrapOptions> wrapOptions;
466 response =
467 getWrapOptions(std::move(returnByValue), std::move(generatePreview),
468 m_inspector->isolate(), &wrapOptions);
469 if (!response.IsSuccess()) {
470 callback->sendFailure(response);
471 return;
472 }
473
474 scope.injectedScript()->addPromiseCallback(
475 m_session, scope.object(), scope.objectGroupName(),
476 std::move(wrapOptions), false /* replMode */,
477 false /* throwOnSideEffect */,
478 EvaluateCallbackWrapper<AwaitPromiseCallback>::wrap(std::move(callback)));
479}
480
481void V8RuntimeAgentImpl::callFunctionOn(
482 const String16& expression, Maybe<String16> objectId,
483 Maybe<protocol::Array<protocol::Runtime::CallArgument>> optionalArguments,
484 Maybe<bool> silent, Maybe<bool> returnByValue, Maybe<bool> generatePreview,
485 Maybe<bool> userGesture, Maybe<bool> awaitPromise,
486 Maybe<int> executionContextId, Maybe<String16> objectGroup,
487 Maybe<bool> throwOnSideEffect, Maybe<String16> uniqueContextId,
488 Maybe<protocol::Runtime::SerializationOptions> serializationOptions,
489 std::unique_ptr<CallFunctionOnCallback> callback) {
490 int justCount = (objectId.has_value() ? 1 : 0) +
491 (executionContextId.has_value() ? 1 : 0) +
492 (uniqueContextId.has_value() ? 1 : 0);
493 if (justCount > 1) {
494 callback->sendFailure(Response::InvalidParams(
495 "ObjectId, executionContextId and uniqueContextId must mutually "
496 "exclude each other"));
497 return;
498 }
499 if (justCount < 1) {
500 callback->sendFailure(
501 Response::InvalidParams("Either objectId or executionContextId or "
502 "uniqueContextId must be specified"));
503 return;
504 }
505
506 if (objectId.has_value()) {
507 InjectedScript::ObjectScope scope(m_session, objectId.value());
508 Response response = scope.initialize();
509 if (!response.IsSuccess()) {
510 callback->sendFailure(response);
511 return;
512 }
513
514 std::unique_ptr<WrapOptions> wrapOptions;
515 response = getWrapOptions(
516 std::move(returnByValue), std::move(generatePreview),
517 std::move(serializationOptions), m_inspector->isolate(), &wrapOptions);
518 if (!response.IsSuccess()) {
519 callback->sendFailure(response);
520 return;
521 }
522
523 innerCallFunctionOn(m_session, scope, scope.object(), expression,
524 std::move(optionalArguments), silent.value_or(false),
525 std::move(wrapOptions), userGesture.value_or(false),
526 awaitPromise.value_or(false),
527 objectGroup.value_or(scope.objectGroupName()),
528 throwOnSideEffect.value_or(false), std::move(callback));
529 } else {
530 int contextId = 0;
531 Response response = ensureContext(m_inspector, m_session->contextGroupId(),
532 std::move(executionContextId),
533 std::move(uniqueContextId), &contextId);
534 if (!response.IsSuccess()) {
535 callback->sendFailure(response);
536 return;
537 }
538 InjectedScript::ContextScope scope(m_session, contextId);
539 response = scope.initialize();
540 if (!response.IsSuccess()) {
541 callback->sendFailure(response);
542 return;
543 }
544
545 std::unique_ptr<WrapOptions> wrapOptions;
546 response = getWrapOptions(
547 std::move(returnByValue), std::move(generatePreview),
548 std::move(serializationOptions), m_inspector->isolate(), &wrapOptions);
549 if (!response.IsSuccess()) {
550 callback->sendFailure(response);
551 return;
552 }
553
554 innerCallFunctionOn(m_session, scope, scope.context()->Global(), expression,
555 std::move(optionalArguments), silent.value_or(false),
556 std::move(wrapOptions), userGesture.value_or(false),
557 awaitPromise.value_or(false), objectGroup.value_or(""),
558 throwOnSideEffect.value_or(false), std::move(callback));
559 }
560}
561
562Response V8RuntimeAgentImpl::getProperties(
563 const String16& objectId, Maybe<bool> ownProperties,
564 Maybe<bool> accessorPropertiesOnly, Maybe<bool> generatePreview,
565 Maybe<bool> nonIndexedPropertiesOnly,
566 std::unique_ptr<protocol::Array<protocol::Runtime::PropertyDescriptor>>*
567 result,
568 Maybe<protocol::Array<protocol::Runtime::InternalPropertyDescriptor>>*
569 internalProperties,
570 Maybe<protocol::Array<protocol::Runtime::PrivatePropertyDescriptor>>*
571 privateProperties,
572 Maybe<protocol::Runtime::ExceptionDetails>* exceptionDetails) {
573 using protocol::Runtime::InternalPropertyDescriptor;
574 using protocol::Runtime::PrivatePropertyDescriptor;
575
576 InjectedScript::ObjectScope scope(m_session, objectId);
577 Response response = scope.initialize();
578 if (!response.IsSuccess()) return response;
579
580 scope.ignoreExceptionsAndMuteConsole();
581 v8::MicrotasksScope microtasks_scope(scope.context(),
582 v8::MicrotasksScope::kRunMicrotasks);
583 if (!scope.object()->IsObject())
584 return Response::ServerError("Value with given id is not an object");
585
586 v8::Local<v8::Object> object = scope.object().As<v8::Object>();
587
588 std::unique_ptr<WrapOptions> wrapOptions;
589 response =
590 getWrapOptions(false /* returnByValue */, std::move(generatePreview),
591 m_inspector->isolate(), &wrapOptions);
592 if (!response.IsSuccess()) return response;
593
594 response = scope.injectedScript()->getProperties(
595 object, scope.objectGroupName(), ownProperties.value_or(false),
596 accessorPropertiesOnly.value_or(false),
597 nonIndexedPropertiesOnly.value_or(false), *wrapOptions, result,
598 exceptionDetails);
599 if (!response.IsSuccess()) return response;
600 if (exceptionDetails->isJust()) return Response::Success();
601 std::unique_ptr<protocol::Array<InternalPropertyDescriptor>>
602 internalPropertiesProtocolArray;
603 std::unique_ptr<protocol::Array<PrivatePropertyDescriptor>>
604 privatePropertiesProtocolArray;
605 response = scope.injectedScript()->getInternalAndPrivateProperties(
606 object, scope.objectGroupName(), accessorPropertiesOnly.value_or(false),
607 &internalPropertiesProtocolArray, &privatePropertiesProtocolArray);
608 if (!response.IsSuccess()) return response;
609 if (!internalPropertiesProtocolArray->empty())
610 *internalProperties = std::move(internalPropertiesProtocolArray);
611 if (!privatePropertiesProtocolArray->empty())
612 *privateProperties = std::move(privatePropertiesProtocolArray);
613 return Response::Success();
614}
615
616Response V8RuntimeAgentImpl::releaseObject(const String16& objectId) {
617 InjectedScript::ObjectScope scope(m_session, objectId);
618 Response response = scope.initialize();
619 if (!response.IsSuccess()) return response;
620 scope.injectedScript()->releaseObject(objectId);
621 return Response::Success();
622}
623
624Response V8RuntimeAgentImpl::releaseObjectGroup(const String16& objectGroup) {
625 m_session->releaseObjectGroup(objectGroup);
626 return Response::Success();
627}
628
629Response V8RuntimeAgentImpl::runIfWaitingForDebugger() {
630 if (m_debuggerBarrier) {
631 m_debuggerBarrier.reset();
632 return Response::Success();
633 }
634 // TODO(chromium:1352175): the below is provisional until client-side changes
635 // land. The call should come through the barrier only once client properly
636 // communicates whether the session is waiting for debugger.
637 m_inspector->client()->runIfWaitingForDebugger(m_session->contextGroupId());
638 return Response::Success();
639}
640
641Response V8RuntimeAgentImpl::setCustomObjectFormatterEnabled(bool enabled) {
642 m_state->setBoolean(V8RuntimeAgentImplState::customObjectFormatterEnabled,
643 enabled);
644 if (!m_enabled) return Response::ServerError("Runtime agent is not enabled");
645 m_session->setCustomObjectFormatterEnabled(enabled);
646 return Response::Success();
647}
648
649Response V8RuntimeAgentImpl::setMaxCallStackSizeToCapture(int size) {
650 if (size < 0) {
651 return Response::ServerError(
652 "maxCallStackSizeToCapture should be non-negative");
653 }
654 TRACE_EVENT_WITH_FLOW1(
655 TRACE_DISABLED_BY_DEFAULT("v8.inspector"),
656 "V8RuntimeAgentImpl::setMaxCallStackSizeToCapture", this,
657 TRACE_EVENT_FLAG_FLOW_IN | TRACE_EVENT_FLAG_FLOW_OUT, "size", size);
658 if (!m_enabled) return Response::ServerError("Runtime agent is not enabled");
659 m_state->setInteger(V8RuntimeAgentImplState::maxCallStackSizeToCapture, size);
660 m_inspector->debugger()->setMaxCallStackSizeToCapture(this, size);
661 return Response::Success();
662}
663
664Response V8RuntimeAgentImpl::discardConsoleEntries() {
665 V8ConsoleMessageStorage* storage =
666 m_inspector->ensureConsoleMessageStorage(m_session->contextGroupId());
667 storage->clear();
668 return Response::Success();
669}
670
671Response V8RuntimeAgentImpl::compileScript(
672 const String16& expression, const String16& sourceURL, bool persistScript,
673 Maybe<int> executionContextId, Maybe<String16>* scriptId,
674 Maybe<protocol::Runtime::ExceptionDetails>* exceptionDetails) {
675 if (!m_enabled) return Response::ServerError("Runtime agent is not enabled");
676
677 int contextId = 0;
678 Response response = ensureContext(m_inspector, m_session->contextGroupId(),
679 std::move(executionContextId),
680 /*uniqueContextId*/ {}, &contextId);
681 if (!response.IsSuccess()) return response;
682 InjectedScript::ContextScope scope(m_session, contextId);
683 response = scope.initialize();
684 if (!response.IsSuccess()) return response;
685
686 if (!persistScript) m_inspector->debugger()->muteScriptParsedEvents();
687 v8::Local<v8::Script> script;
688 bool isOk = m_inspector->compileScript(scope.context(), expression, sourceURL)
689 .ToLocal(&script);
690 if (!persistScript) m_inspector->debugger()->unmuteScriptParsedEvents();
691 if (!isOk) {
692 if (scope.tryCatch().HasCaught()) {
693 response = scope.injectedScript()->createExceptionDetails(
694 scope.tryCatch(), String16(), exceptionDetails);
695 if (!response.IsSuccess()) return response;
696 return Response::Success();
697 } else {
698 return Response::ServerError("Script compilation failed");
699 }
700 }
701
702 if (!persistScript) return Response::Success();
703
704 String16 scriptValueId =
705 String16::fromInteger(script->GetUnboundScript()->GetId());
706 std::unique_ptr<v8::Global<v8::Script>> global(
707 new v8::Global<v8::Script>(m_inspector->isolate(), script));
708 m_compiledScripts[scriptValueId] = std::move(global);
709 *scriptId = scriptValueId;
710 return Response::Success();
711}
712
713void V8RuntimeAgentImpl::runScript(
714 const String16& scriptId, Maybe<int> executionContextId,
715 Maybe<String16> objectGroup, Maybe<bool> silent,
716 Maybe<bool> includeCommandLineAPI, Maybe<bool> returnByValue,
717 Maybe<bool> generatePreview, Maybe<bool> awaitPromise,
718 std::unique_ptr<RunScriptCallback> callback) {
719 if (!m_enabled) {
720 callback->sendFailure(
721 Response::ServerError("Runtime agent is not enabled"));
722 return;
723 }
724
725 auto it = m_compiledScripts.find(scriptId);
726 if (it == m_compiledScripts.end()) {
727 callback->sendFailure(Response::ServerError("No script with given id"));
728 return;
729 }
730
731 int contextId = 0;
732 Response response = ensureContext(m_inspector, m_session->contextGroupId(),
733 std::move(executionContextId),
734 /*uniqueContextId*/ {}, &contextId);
735 if (!response.IsSuccess()) {
736 callback->sendFailure(response);
737 return;
738 }
739
740 InjectedScript::ContextScope scope(m_session, contextId);
741 response = scope.initialize();
742 if (!response.IsSuccess()) {
743 callback->sendFailure(response);
744 return;
745 }
746
747 if (silent.value_or(false)) scope.ignoreExceptionsAndMuteConsole();
748
749 std::unique_ptr<v8::Global<v8::Script>> scriptWrapper = std::move(it->second);
750 m_compiledScripts.erase(it);
751 v8::Local<v8::Script> script = scriptWrapper->Get(m_inspector->isolate());
752 if (script.IsEmpty()) {
753 callback->sendFailure(Response::ServerError("Script execution failed"));
754 return;
755 }
756
757 if (includeCommandLineAPI.value_or(false)) scope.installCommandLineAPI();
758
759 v8::MaybeLocal<v8::Value> maybeResultValue;
760 {
761 v8::MicrotasksScope microtasksScope(scope.context(),
762 v8::MicrotasksScope::kRunMicrotasks);
763 maybeResultValue = script->Run(scope.context());
764 }
765
766 // Re-initialize after running client's code, as it could have destroyed
767 // context or session.
768 response = scope.initialize();
769 if (!response.IsSuccess()) {
770 callback->sendFailure(response);
771 return;
772 }
773
774 std::unique_ptr<WrapOptions> wrapOptions;
775 response =
776 getWrapOptions(std::move(returnByValue), std::move(generatePreview),
777 m_inspector->isolate(), &wrapOptions);
778 if (!response.IsSuccess()) {
779 callback->sendFailure(response);
780 return;
781 }
782
783 if (!awaitPromise.value_or(false) || scope.tryCatch().HasCaught()) {
784 wrapEvaluateResultAsync(scope.injectedScript(), maybeResultValue,
785 scope.tryCatch(), objectGroup.value_or(""),
786 *wrapOptions, false /* throwOnSideEffect */,
787 callback.get());
788 return;
789 }
790 scope.injectedScript()->addPromiseCallback(
791 m_session, maybeResultValue.ToLocalChecked(), objectGroup.value_or(""),
792 std::move(wrapOptions), false /* replMode */,
793 false /* throwOnSideEffect */,
794 EvaluateCallbackWrapper<RunScriptCallback>::wrap(std::move(callback)));
795}
796
797Response V8RuntimeAgentImpl::queryObjects(
798 const String16& prototypeObjectId, Maybe<String16> objectGroup,
799 std::unique_ptr<protocol::Runtime::RemoteObject>* objects) {
800 InjectedScript::ObjectScope scope(m_session, prototypeObjectId);
801 Response response = scope.initialize();
802 if (!response.IsSuccess()) return response;
803 if (!scope.object()->IsObject()) {
804 return Response::ServerError("Prototype should be instance of Object");
805 }
806 v8::Local<v8::Array> resultArray = m_inspector->debugger()->queryObjects(
807 scope.context(), scope.object().As<v8::Object>());
808 return scope.injectedScript()->wrapObject(
809 resultArray, objectGroup.value_or(scope.objectGroupName()),
810 WrapOptions({WrapMode::kIdOnly}), objects);
811}
812
813Response V8RuntimeAgentImpl::globalLexicalScopeNames(
814 Maybe<int> executionContextId,
815 std::unique_ptr<protocol::Array<String16>>* outNames) {
816 int contextId = 0;
817 Response response = ensureContext(m_inspector, m_session->contextGroupId(),
818 std::move(executionContextId),
819 /*uniqueContextId*/ {}, &contextId);
820 if (!response.IsSuccess()) return response;
821
822 InjectedScript::ContextScope scope(m_session, contextId);
823 response = scope.initialize();
824 if (!response.IsSuccess()) return response;
825
826 std::vector<v8::Global<v8::String>> names;
827 v8::debug::GlobalLexicalScopeNames(scope.context(), &names);
828 *outNames = std::make_unique<protocol::Array<String16>>();
829 for (size_t i = 0; i < names.size(); ++i) {
830 (*outNames)->emplace_back(toProtocolString(
831 m_inspector->isolate(), names[i].Get(m_inspector->isolate())));
832 }
833 return Response::Success();
834}
835
836Response V8RuntimeAgentImpl::getIsolateId(String16* outIsolateId) {
837 char buf[40];
838 std::snprintf(buf, sizeof(buf), "%" PRIx64, m_inspector->isolateId());
839 *outIsolateId = buf;
840 return Response::Success();
841}
842
843Response V8RuntimeAgentImpl::getHeapUsage(double* out_usedSize,
844 double* out_totalSize) {
845 v8::HeapStatistics stats;
846 m_inspector->isolate()->GetHeapStatistics(&stats);
847 *out_usedSize = stats.used_heap_size();
848 *out_totalSize = stats.total_heap_size();
849 return Response::Success();
850}
851
852void V8RuntimeAgentImpl::terminateExecution(
853 std::unique_ptr<TerminateExecutionCallback> callback) {
854 v8::HandleScope handles(m_inspector->isolate());
855 v8::Local<v8::Context> defaultContext =
856 m_inspector->client()->ensureDefaultContextInGroup(
857 m_session->contextGroupId());
858
859 m_inspector->debugger()->terminateExecution(defaultContext,
860 std::move(callback));
861}
862
863namespace {
864protocol::DictionaryValue* getOrCreateDictionary(
865 protocol::DictionaryValue* dict, const String16& key) {
866 if (protocol::DictionaryValue* bindings = dict->getObject(key))
867 return bindings;
868 dict->setObject(key, protocol::DictionaryValue::create());
869 return dict->getObject(key);
870}
871} // namespace
872
873Response V8RuntimeAgentImpl::addBinding(const String16& name,
874 Maybe<int> executionContextId,
875 Maybe<String16> executionContextName) {
876 if (executionContextId.has_value()) {
877 if (executionContextName.has_value()) {
878 return Response::InvalidParams(
879 "executionContextName is mutually exclusive with executionContextId");
880 }
881 int contextId = executionContextId.value();
882 InspectedContext* context =
883 m_inspector->getContext(m_session->contextGroupId(), contextId);
884 if (!context) {
885 return Response::InvalidParams(
886 "Cannot find execution context with given executionContextId");
887 }
888 addBinding(context, name);
889 return Response::Success();
890 }
891
892 // If it's a globally exposed binding, i.e. no context name specified, use
893 // a special value for the context name.
894 String16 contextKey = V8RuntimeAgentImplState::globalBindingsKey;
895 if (executionContextName.has_value()) {
896 contextKey = executionContextName.value();
897 if (contextKey == V8RuntimeAgentImplState::globalBindingsKey) {
898 return Response::InvalidParams("Invalid executionContextName");
899 }
900 }
901 // Only persist non context-specific bindings, as contextIds don't make
902 // any sense when state is restored in a different process.
903 protocol::DictionaryValue* bindings =
904 getOrCreateDictionary(m_state, V8RuntimeAgentImplState::bindings);
905 protocol::DictionaryValue* contextBindings =
906 getOrCreateDictionary(bindings, contextKey);
907 contextBindings->setBoolean(name, true);
908
909 m_inspector->forEachContext(
910 m_session->contextGroupId(),
911 [&name, &executionContextName, this](InspectedContext* context) {
912 if (executionContextName.has_value() &&
913 executionContextName.value() != context->humanReadableName())
914 return;
915 addBinding(context, name);
916 });
917 return Response::Success();
918}
919
920void V8RuntimeAgentImpl::bindingCallback(
921 const v8::FunctionCallbackInfo<v8::Value>& info) {
922 v8::Isolate* isolate = info.GetIsolate();
923 if (info.Length() != 1 || !info[0]->IsString()) {
924 info.GetIsolate()->ThrowError(
925 "Invalid arguments: should be exactly one string.");
926 return;
927 }
928 V8InspectorImpl* inspector =
929 static_cast<V8InspectorImpl*>(v8::debug::GetInspector(isolate));
930 int contextId = InspectedContext::contextId(isolate->GetCurrentContext());
931 int contextGroupId = inspector->contextGroupId(contextId);
932
933 String16 name = toProtocolString(isolate, info.Data().As<v8::String>());
934 String16 payload = toProtocolString(isolate, info[0].As<v8::String>());
935
936 inspector->forEachSession(
937 contextGroupId,
938 [&name, &payload, &contextId](V8InspectorSessionImpl* session) {
939 session->runtimeAgent()->bindingCalled(name, payload, contextId);
940 });
941}
942
943void V8RuntimeAgentImpl::addBinding(InspectedContext* context,
944 const String16& name) {
945 auto it = m_activeBindings.find(name);
946 if (it != m_activeBindings.end() && it->second.count(context->contextId())) {
947 return;
948 }
949 v8::HandleScope handles(m_inspector->isolate());
950 v8::Local<v8::Context> localContext = context->context();
951 v8::Local<v8::Object> global = localContext->Global();
952 v8::Local<v8::String> v8Name = toV8String(m_inspector->isolate(), name);
953 v8::Local<v8::Value> functionValue;
954 v8::MicrotasksScope microtasks(localContext,
955 v8::MicrotasksScope::kDoNotRunMicrotasks);
956 if (v8::Function::New(localContext, bindingCallback, v8Name)
957 .ToLocal(&functionValue)) {
958 v8::Maybe<bool> success = global->Set(localContext, v8Name, functionValue);
959 USE(success);
960 if (it == m_activeBindings.end()) {
961 m_activeBindings.emplace(name,
962 std::unordered_set<int>(context->contextId()));
963 } else {
964 m_activeBindings.at(name).insert(context->contextId());
965 }
966 }
967}
968
969Response V8RuntimeAgentImpl::removeBinding(const String16& name) {
970 protocol::DictionaryValue* bindings =
971 m_state->getObject(V8RuntimeAgentImplState::bindings);
972 if (bindings) bindings->remove(name);
973 m_activeBindings.erase(name);
974 return Response::Success();
975}
976
977Response V8RuntimeAgentImpl::getExceptionDetails(
978 const String16& errorObjectId,
979 Maybe<protocol::Runtime::ExceptionDetails>* out_exceptionDetails) {
980 InjectedScript::ObjectScope scope(m_session, errorObjectId);
981 Response response = scope.initialize();
982 if (!response.IsSuccess()) return response;
983
984 const v8::Local<v8::Value> error = scope.object();
985 if (!error->IsNativeError())
986 return Response::ServerError("errorObjectId is not a JS error object");
987
988 const v8::Local<v8::Message> message =
989 v8::debug::CreateMessageFromException(m_inspector->isolate(), error);
990
991 response = scope.injectedScript()->createExceptionDetails(
992 message, error, scope.objectGroupName(), out_exceptionDetails);
993 if (!response.IsSuccess()) return response;
994
995 CHECK(out_exceptionDetails->isJust());
996
997 // When an exception object is present, `createExceptionDetails` assumes
998 // the exception is uncaught and will overwrite the text field to "Uncaught".
999 // Lets use the normal message text instead.
1000 out_exceptionDetails->fromJust()->setText(
1001 toProtocolString(m_inspector->isolate(), message->Get()));
1002
1003 // Check if the exception has any metadata on the inspector and also attach
1004 // it.
1005 std::unique_ptr<protocol::DictionaryValue> data =
1006 m_inspector->getAssociatedExceptionDataForProtocol(error);
1007 if (data)
1008 out_exceptionDetails->fromJust()->setExceptionMetaData(std::move(data));
1009 return Response::Success();
1010}
1011
1012void V8RuntimeAgentImpl::bindingCalled(const String16& name,
1013 const String16& payload,
1014 int executionContextId) {
1015 if (!m_activeBindings.count(name)) return;
1016 m_frontend.bindingCalled(name, payload, executionContextId);
1017 m_frontend.flush();
1018}
1019
1020void V8RuntimeAgentImpl::addBindings(InspectedContext* context) {
1021 const String16 contextName = context->humanReadableName();
1022 if (!m_enabled) return;
1023 protocol::DictionaryValue* bindings =
1024 m_state->getObject(V8RuntimeAgentImplState::bindings);
1025 if (!bindings) return;
1026 protocol::DictionaryValue* globalBindings =
1027 bindings->getObject(V8RuntimeAgentImplState::globalBindingsKey);
1028 if (globalBindings) {
1029 for (size_t i = 0; i < globalBindings->size(); ++i)
1030 addBinding(context, globalBindings->at(i).first);
1031 }
1032 protocol::DictionaryValue* contextBindings =
1033 contextName.isEmpty() ? nullptr : bindings->getObject(contextName);
1034 if (contextBindings) {
1035 for (size_t i = 0; i < contextBindings->size(); ++i)
1036 addBinding(context, contextBindings->at(i).first);
1037 }
1038}
1039
1040void V8RuntimeAgentImpl::restore() {
1041 if (!m_state->booleanProperty(V8RuntimeAgentImplState::runtimeEnabled, false))
1042 return;
1043 m_frontend.executionContextsCleared();
1044 enable();
1045 if (m_state->booleanProperty(
1046 V8RuntimeAgentImplState::customObjectFormatterEnabled, false))
1047 m_session->setCustomObjectFormatterEnabled(true);
1048
1049 int size;
1050 if (m_state->getInteger(V8RuntimeAgentImplState::maxCallStackSizeToCapture,
1051 &size))
1052 m_inspector->debugger()->setMaxCallStackSizeToCapture(this, size);
1053
1054 m_inspector->forEachContext(
1055 m_session->contextGroupId(),
1056 [this](InspectedContext* context) { addBindings(context); });
1057}
1058
1059Response V8RuntimeAgentImpl::enable() {
1060 if (m_enabled) return Response::Success();
1061 TRACE_EVENT_WITH_FLOW0(TRACE_DISABLED_BY_DEFAULT("v8.inspector"),
1062 "V8RuntimeAgentImpl::enable", this,
1063 TRACE_EVENT_FLAG_FLOW_OUT);
1064 m_inspector->client()->beginEnsureAllContextsInGroup(
1065 m_session->contextGroupId());
1066 m_enabled = true;
1067 m_state->setBoolean(V8RuntimeAgentImplState::runtimeEnabled, true);
1068 m_inspector->debugger()->setMaxCallStackSizeToCapture(
1069 this, V8StackTraceImpl::kDefaultMaxCallStackSizeToCapture);
1070 m_session->reportAllContexts(this);
1071 V8ConsoleMessageStorage* storage =
1072 m_inspector->ensureConsoleMessageStorage(m_session->contextGroupId());
1073 for (const auto& message : storage->messages()) {
1074 if (!reportMessage(message.get(), false)) break;
1075 }
1076 return Response::Success();
1077}
1078
1079Response V8RuntimeAgentImpl::disable() {
1080 if (!m_enabled) return Response::Success();
1081 TRACE_EVENT_WITH_FLOW0(TRACE_DISABLED_BY_DEFAULT("v8.inspector"),
1082 "V8RuntimeAgentImpl::disable", this,
1083 TRACE_EVENT_FLAG_FLOW_IN);
1084 m_enabled = false;
1085 m_state->setBoolean(V8RuntimeAgentImplState::runtimeEnabled, false);
1086 m_state->remove(V8RuntimeAgentImplState::bindings);
1087 m_inspector->debugger()->setMaxCallStackSizeToCapture(this, -1);
1088 m_session->setCustomObjectFormatterEnabled(false);
1089 reset();
1090 m_inspector->client()->endEnsureAllContextsInGroup(
1091 m_session->contextGroupId());
1092 if (m_session->debuggerAgent() && !m_session->debuggerAgent()->enabled()) {
1093 m_session->debuggerAgent()->setAsyncCallStackDepth(0);
1094 }
1095 return Response::Success();
1096}
1097
1098void V8RuntimeAgentImpl::reset() {
1099 m_compiledScripts.clear();
1100 if (m_enabled) {
1101 int sessionId = m_session->sessionId();
1102 m_inspector->forEachContext(m_session->contextGroupId(),
1103 [&sessionId](InspectedContext* context) {
1104 context->setReported(sessionId, false);
1105 });
1106 m_frontend.executionContextsCleared();
1107 }
1108}
1109
1110void V8RuntimeAgentImpl::reportExecutionContextCreated(
1111 InspectedContext* context) {
1112 if (!m_enabled) return;
1113 context->setReported(m_session->sessionId(), true);
1114 std::unique_ptr<protocol::Runtime::ExecutionContextDescription> description =
1115 protocol::Runtime::ExecutionContextDescription::create()
1116 .setId(context->contextId())
1117 .setName(context->humanReadableName())
1118 .setOrigin(context->origin())
1119 .setUniqueId(context->uniqueId().toString())
1120 .build();
1121 const String16& aux = context->auxData();
1122 if (!aux.isEmpty()) {
1123 std::vector<uint8_t> cbor;
1124 v8_crdtp::json::ConvertJSONToCBOR(
1125 v8_crdtp::span<uint16_t>(aux.characters16(), aux.length()), &cbor);
1126 description->setAuxData(protocol::DictionaryValue::cast(
1127 protocol::Value::parseBinary(cbor.data(), cbor.size())));
1128 }
1129 m_frontend.executionContextCreated(std::move(description));
1130}
1131
1132void V8RuntimeAgentImpl::reportExecutionContextDestroyed(
1133 InspectedContext* context) {
1134 if (m_enabled && context->isReported(m_session->sessionId())) {
1135 context->setReported(m_session->sessionId(), false);
1136 m_frontend.executionContextDestroyed(context->contextId(),
1137 context->uniqueId().toString());
1138 }
1139}
1140
1141void V8RuntimeAgentImpl::inspect(
1142 std::unique_ptr<protocol::Runtime::RemoteObject> objectToInspect,
1143 std::unique_ptr<protocol::DictionaryValue> hints, int executionContextId) {
1144 if (m_enabled)
1145 m_frontend.inspectRequested(std::move(objectToInspect), std::move(hints),
1146 executionContextId);
1147}
1148
1149void V8RuntimeAgentImpl::messageAdded(V8ConsoleMessage* message) {
1150 if (m_enabled) reportMessage(message, true);
1151}
1152
1153bool V8RuntimeAgentImpl::reportMessage(V8ConsoleMessage* message,
1154 bool generatePreview) {
1155 message->reportToFrontend(&m_frontend, m_session, generatePreview);
1156 m_frontend.flush();
1157 return m_inspector->hasConsoleMessageStorage(m_session->contextGroupId());
1158}
